divs: sighting detailsi saw this ufo on august the 30th, 2008 at 2:15 in the am cst in st. louis. it appeared to be just a plane with regular lights and such so i wasn't excited about it at first. it was high up like the vapor-trail jets. then several seconds later all of a sudden it changed. from regular blinking lights to one big bright light that resemble like a planet. it was traveling slow and then it transformed again into fading lights which appeared to be fading in and out which seemed like it was flying even higher. when it was further down south a shooting star-like object shot next to it. shooting stars can't control their speeds but this one did. it was going slow and then it hurried up and zoomed off! i'm not sure what that was but i think that the one that transformed was a hybrid ship being built at area 51 with alien technology but flown by humans. this craft made no sound at all and i saw it for a couple minutes. i am now aware to looked at even what appears to be regular earth air vehicles as this really fooled me! did anyone else see this activity at the same time or date i did? let me know! ----------------------------------------------- previous sighting & information this happen on august 25th, 2008 around 9:30 pm central time in saint louis. i'm a usual stargazer as i love to look at the sky and admire its beauty in our front yard. i have had ufo experiences previously so i also go outside to see if i can see any activity up in the sky. (please read below for more!). i saw this star-like ufo traveling north west. it was extremely high up. it seemed hundreds if not thousands of feet above the atmosphere. it has no blinking lights as it looked like a star. it was traveling straight and slow and then it slowly disappeared because of the streetlight. when i saw it i was excited and had my eyes on it for most of the time and i knew it wasn't a plane and then with further observing i knew it wasn't any earth vehicle or satellite, it was one of them! this happen on august 11th, 2008 around 9:30 pm central time in saint louis. i'm a usual stargazer as i love to look at the sky and admire its beauty in our front yard. i have had ufo experiences previously and i also go outside to see if i can see any activity up in the sky. (please read below for more!). i saw this star-like ufo traveling down south. it was extremely high up. it seemed hundreds of feet above the atmosphere. it has no blinking lights as it looked like a planet. it was traveling straight and slow and then it slowly disappeared which appeared the object had cloaked. when i saw it i was excited and had my eyes on it for most of the time and i thought is that a plane and then with further observing i knew it wasn't any earth vehicle or satellite. i have had many experiences like this in the past since 2001. i have seen several like this one this year. i seen a ginormous ufo a few weeks prior which appeared to be as big as jupiter traveling north which behaved like the one i saw on the 11th. i have seen these behave different in many ways. i have seen them travel back and forth, and cloak and uncloak like a peek-a-boo or a now you see me, now you don't game. i have recently seen one that was going down east which the entire object was flashing but it was a very slow flashing characteristic. now, i have seen two that were not like these a couple years ago. these were on two separate days. they both were extremely high but had a very unusual red flashing characteristic and the one went into hyperspace or warp speed like you see in the star wars and star trek films. that was incredible to witness! i believe these red ones are man made but has alien technology. i have been wondering so long what these are and who\what might be piloting them. it is a wonderful but creepy feeling that i get when i see these objects because i wonder are they the grays, the insectoids or something that we know absolutely nothing about or all of these different species. by seeing these ufos i know that we are not alone! if anyone has any answers and\or has had these experiences please contact me at capri1981@aol.com with your information!
